lead_paragraph: In many ways, it was a dream, going from 2-14 and the first overall pick in the NFL draft to 11-5 and a spot in the playoffs. Yet it ended in just about the most nightmarish way possible, a second-half collapse and another round of postseason heartache.

headline.main: Dream Season for Chiefs Ends in Nightmare Fashion
headline.print_headline: Dream Season for Chiefs Ends in Nightmare Fashion
